plays.text: Goal scored by Daniel Briere assisted by Danny Markov and Claude Lemieux
Penalty to Phil Housley 2 minutes for Interference Ladislav Nagy
Penalty to Ossi Vaananen 2 minutes for Crosschecking Eric Daze
Goal scored by Brad May assisted by Michal Handzus
Penalty to Aaron Downey 5 minutes for Fighting Andrei Nazarov
Penalty to Andrei Nazarov 5 minutes for Fighting Aaron Downey
Penalty to Mark Bell 2 minutes for Slashing Drake Berehowsky
Penalty to Drake Berehowsky 2 minutes for Interference Mark Bell
Penalty to Brad May 2 minutes for Roughing Bob Probert
Penalty to Bob Probert 2 minutes for Roughing Brad May
Penalty to Daymond Langkow 2 minutes for Hooking Aaron Downey
Penalty to Ossi Vaananen 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Tony Amonte
Goal scored by Michael Nylander assisted by Eric Daze and Kyle Calder
Penalty to Igor Korolev 2 minutes for Hooking Daniel Briere
Goal scored by Michal Handzus unassisted
